Banner.Description: I have around 3 years of experience designing scalable architectures, optimizing databases, and delivering secure, high-performance systems using Java, Spring Boot, and Microservices.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: With around 3 years of experience as a backend developer, I am passionate about building scalable and reliable systems. My expertise lies in Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL, and I have also worked with Microservices, Kafka, and RESTful APIs. Alongside coding, I have collaborated with teams by sharing knowledge, motivating peers, and contributing to achieving project goals effectively.

I focus on designing secure architectures, optimizing database performance, and improving system efficiency. My approach emphasizes writing clean, reusable, and maintainable code while following best practices and industry standards.
Some of the technologies and tools I have worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: SDE-1
Description: Refactored and tuned SQL queries, cutting execution time by 80% using advanced partitioning and indexing strategies.
Developed Kafka-based messaging pipelines to process ML outputs, automating QA scoring and improving conversation analysis accuracy by 25%, handling over 1 million conversations per day.
Integrated AI-driven recommendation APIs to prioritize follow-up deals and provide personalized next-best action suggestions for the sales team.
Executed zero-downtime migrations, safeguarding 99.9% data integrity during critical platform upgrades.
Enhanced analytics dashboards, reducing query latency by 40% and accelerating business decision-making.
Led code reviews and mentored junior engineers, enforcing best practices in CI/CD, system design, and coding standards.

Experience.Jobs.Title: SDE
Description: Engineered and maintained RESTful APIs for accounting apps, improving transaction efficiency by 25%.
Optimized SQL queries for financial/compliance reports, reducing generation time by 30%.
Implemented RBAC and multi-level approvals, strengthening enterprise security and compliance.
Developed reusable Angular components, reducing feature delivery time by 20%.
Enhanced inventory management system with real-time tracking, improving accuracy by 15%.
Built offline-first POS sync APIs, ensuring seamless data sync with central systems.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: BindGo
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-commerce application made from scratch with auth module, configurable different Modules, product, Cart, Order and Review. It also has feedback form logic for all products.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Online Cab Booking Application
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: We have create a REST API for online cab booking application which can be used by customers to login into their profile, update their information and book cabs, by a driver to login and update their details along with their cab details and accept a ride from the customer. All this is over looked by the admin who can also login and update their information as well as access the data in the application.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Bus-Ticket-Reservation-System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A bus ticket reservation system is an java application designed to provide customers with a personalized easy-to-utilize user experience for booking and purchasing tickets online. It stores customers' personal data records, scheduled routes, frequent trips, drop points, and other information.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Asos
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: ASOS is an E-commerce website in this website we can purchase various products like Dresses , Women Clothes, Men Clothes and more. A collaborative project, built in 5 days by a team of 6 developers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: KindMeal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Kindmeal is a food delivery website here you can order food from favourite restaurants near you. We a group of 5 people have cloned Kindmeal website in unit 2 Contruct week of Masai School.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Weather Application
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This is weather app. This is a solo project here you can find climate details of any region. Every Time you refresh the background picture automatic change it shows you beauty of nature.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Spotify
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This is spotify Music Application Where you set upload songs, albums and artist and play Song. The main objective of this application to learn AWS with spring boot

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Toll-Calculator
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Toll Calculator Toll Calculator for different Vehicles Features: Calculating Total Toll, Calculating Total Discount, Calculating Total Fastag Amount Collected, Calculating Total Cash Amount Collected

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
